error_account_name_not_available: Este nombre de usuario ya ha sido registrado.
error_eosio_assert_message_exception: The EOS blockchain returned a generic error based on your request. Please check that the information is valid and try again.
error_invalid_accountName: Nombre de cuenta no válido, asegúrate de que contiene de 1 a 12 letras.
error_invalid_activeKey: Clave activa no válida, asegúrese de que comienza con 'EOS' y está compuesta por 53 caracteres.
error_invalid_delegatedBw: Cantidad de ancho de banda no válido, ej. '12.121'.
error_invalid_delegatedCpu: Cantidad de CPU no válido, ej. '12.121'.
error_invalid_ownerKey: Clave de dueño no válida, asegúrese de que comienza con 'EOS' y está compuesta por 53 caracteres.
error_invalid_ramAmount: Cantidad de RAM no válido, una cantidad válida debe ser un número entero sin decimales, por ejemplo: '1200'.
error_no_stake_left: Unable to set staked amount to 0. Doing so would prevent you from performing any transactions on the network.
error_not_enough_balance: Insufficient available EOS balance to complete transaction.
error_not_enough_delegated_bw_for_new_ac: Necesitas delegar algunos recursos de ancho de banda a la nueva cuenta.
error_not_enough_delegated_cpu_for_new_a: Necesitas delegar algunos recursos de CPU a la nueva cuenta.
error_not_valid_account_name: Este no es un nombre de cuenta válido
error_not_valid_stake_amount: Not a valid Stake Amount (must have be a positive amount with a maximum of 4 decimals of precision eg. 12.1212).
error_ram_under_minimum_for_new_account: A minimum of 4000 Bytes of RAM is required to create a new account.
error_ram_has_to_be_over_minimum_amount: A minimum of 3 bytes of RAM is required per transaction.
error_ram_not_valid_amount: Invalid RAM amount. A valid amount should be a whole number with no decimals.
error_ram_usage_exceeded: RAM usage exceeded. You will need to buy more ram to carry out this action.
error_ram_using_more_than_usage: Insuficiente balance RAM disponible para completar la transacción.
global_account_import_private_descriptio: Para importar cuentas adicionales, introduzca la clave privada. La aplicación la convertirá en una clave pública y buscará todas las cuentas con los permisos pertinentes.
global_account_import_private_key: Clave privada (51 caracteres y comienza con el número 5)
global_account_import_private_requires_h: Esta acción requiere un Monedero Caliente existente.

Cambie a un monedero caliente existente antes de importar para proceder. Si está utilizando el monedero sólo en modo ver Monedero y desea utilizar las funciones de monedero caliente, por favor, reinicie la aplicación e importe el monedero caliente primero.
global_account_import_select_accounts: Select one or more accounts to import with this private key
global_account_import_watch_description: Import an account as a Watch Wallet, which can monitor the account and create unsigned transactions.
global_accounts_dropdown_no_accounts: No additional wallets created. To get started go to 'Tools', then 'Manage Wallets'.
global_button_elevate_failure_header: The password entered does not match that of the wallet currently selected.
global_button_elevate_modal_description: Enter the wallet password to continue
global_dangerlink_warning_body_1: eos-voter can not vouch for the safety of the website you are about to visit. Please be dilligent with the security of your keys and account information, only sharing information when you are absolutely sure it can be trusted.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_3: If you wish to proceed, confirm below.
global_dangerlink_warning_title: Warning: You are leaving this app
global_modal_settings_customtoken_descri: Enter the account for any custom token contract you wish to monitor.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_notfou: The details for the token entered could not be found.
global_transaction_actions_details_conte: Each action within this transaction are listed below.
global_transaction_complete_message: Su(s) transacción(es) ha(n) sido presentadas a la blockchain.
global_transaction_complete_warning_mess: Submitting a transaction does not guarantee it will be confirmed. To ensure that this transaction has been completed and confirmed within the network, please reference the above transaction ID on a block explorer to ensure it enters the last irreversible block.
global_transaction_full_details_content: The full data from this transaction is listed below.
global_transaction_unsigned_message: An unsigned transaction has been created by this watch-mode wallet. Use the button below to save it as a file which can then be signed by a cold wallet.
global_transaction_unsigned_warning_mess: Each transaction must be signed and broadcast within one hour of it's creation.
